name: mocha-marble-bdd
description: Mocha BDD UI extended for RxJs5 marble testing
author: Barry Kaplan <barry@systeminsights.com>

scripts.tc:eslint: echo 'ESlint not enforced because code was copied from mocha project'
scripts.tc:coverage: NODE_ENV=nyc ELASTIC_APM_ACTIVE=false nyc --nycrc-path=node_modules/babel-preset-vi-node/.nycrc mocha --ui marble-bdd --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter --require @babel/register --require index.js --recursive ./test
scripts.tc:build: babel index.js -d dist; babel src -d dist/src
